name: OR_CASE_OUTPAT_RSNS
description: The OR_CASE_OUTPAT_RSNS table contains information about the reasons why the case was scheduled as an outpatient procedure.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RSN_SCHED_OUTPAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for why the case was scheduled as outpatient.
